name: Feed the Queen (Uniday Studio)
description:
Feed the Queen is a Platformer game where you control a Queen's waiter that really struggles to keep her satisfied when it comes to food.

When playing the game, you'll have to find the appropriate food that the queen wants (according to the recipe in the bottom of the screen) and carefully carry the ingredients to the queen. 

And you may ask...

But what's the challenge?

Well, your tray and the food are all physically simulated objects, so you'll have to take a lot of carry when moving around, otherwise all you efforts will be useless.

....

How to play?

Use W, D to move the character, A, D to rotate and SPACE to jump. 

To grab your Tray (to carry items), press E. Same to release the items. You need to feed the Queen according to her recipe (bottom of the screen). 

The Queen will eventually need to go to the bathroom and you'll have to take her! Get close enough and press E to carry the queen.
